attributes.action: Call for an Enquiry into BBC editorial bias against the YES Campaign during reporting of the Scottish Referendum and wider implications for democracy
attributes.additional_details: It has become necessary to call for an enquiry into the BBC's editorial bias against the YES Campaign during it's reporting of the Scottish Referendum and the wider implications this case has on the impartiality of the BBC and democracy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC Trust.
